title: Finding a specific malware sample [closed]
content:
I am trying to find for analysis the scuinst.exe binary (R2D2 aka Bundestrojaner), but I can not find it.

Where can I find this binary?

comments.text: The best is probably to find out the relevant SHA1 (or other hash) and then have a look at this topic to find a place where - by looking up the hash - you can download a sample. The reason all the answers in that other topic are community wikis is because this is actually off-topic here. So this question will eventually be closed.

answers_data.content:
A simple search revealed that it can be found on VirusTotal by searching for md5sum 309ede406988486bf81e603c514b4b82:

https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/021da2f5e892265cafd1642a44fe258ee56cf6e1393f6e0dc79add99fed1f15f/detection

For more information refer to the following articles:
